description:
Modern luxury awaits you here from within the walls of the stunning "Infinity" complex in East Perth, where this stylish 2 bedroom 2 bathroom fifth-floor apartment lies along vibrant Adelaide Terrace.

Amongst the development's first-class common areas are a sublime outdoor swimming-pool and spa deck, an outdoor barbecue area, a huge common room with a kitchenette and toilets, a games/entertainment room, a sauna and a gym. Downstairs, an underground single car bay is complemented by an adjacent lock-up storeroom.

Take the lift up from the lobby and be welcomed into your apartment by a beautifully-tiled kitchen, complete with sparkling dark-granite bench tops, double sinks, a water-filter tap, tiled splashbacks, a breakfast bar for casual meals, a Fisher and Paykel stainless-steel dishwasher, a Baumatic electric/ceramic cooktop and an oven of the same brand. It all seamlessly integrates with the large carpeted open-plan living and dining area, boasting split-system air-conditioning and external access to a large north-facing balcony with a gorgeous streetscape in the background.

Both bedrooms are also carpeted for complete comfort, inclusive of the master suite where split-system air-conditioning meets full-height mirrored built-in wardrobes and balcony access, as well as plenty of natural sunlight due to the residence's splendid north-facing aspect. An intimate master-ensuite bathroom is impeccably-appointed with a shower, toilet and sleek granite vanity.

The second bedroom has mirrored built-in robes also, whilst the combined main bathroom-come-laundry plays host to a granite vanity, a granite and stainless-steel wash trough, a bathtub with a showerhead, a toilet, a broom cupboard and additional under-bench storage for good measure.

Leave the car locked up and walk to cafes, restaurants, bars, entertainment, shopping, free public transport, our beautiful Queens Gardens, the WACA Ground, Optus Stadium, Wellington Square and even Elizabeth Quay, right beside our picturesque Swan River. It's all here and so easily accessible. This truly is a location like no other!


Other features include, but are not limited to;

• Secure fob access into the building and carpark area
• Full-height windows and sliders for extra natural light to filter in
• Audio-intercom system
• Ticketed off-road parking bays for guests and visitors on Adelaide Terrace
• 330m (approx.) to Langley Park
• 750m (approx.) to Point Fraser
• 1.6km (approx.) to Elizabeth Quay
• 1.7km (approx.) to Perth CBD
• 1.9km (approx.) to the Perth Underground Station
• 2.1m (approx.) to Optus Stadium at Burswood

Council Rates : $1,839.55 pa
Water Rates : $1,334.88 pa
Strata Fees : $968.00 pq

DISCLAIMER: Whilst every care has been taken with the preparation of the particulars contained in the information supplied, believed to be correct, neither the Agent nor the client nor servants of both, guarantee their accuracy. Interested persons are advised to make their own enquiries and satisfy themselves in all respects. The particulars contained are not intended to form part of any contract.
